title: Odžaci oil shale deposit
text: The Odžaci <a href="oil%20shale">oil shale</a> deposit is located in <a href="Od%C5%BEaci">Odžaci</a>, <a href="West%20Ba%C4%8Dka%20District">West Bačka District</a>, <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>. The deposit has oil shale reserves amounting to 20 million tonnes, one of the largest in <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a> and <a href="Europe">Europe</a> and has an organic content equivalent to 0.3 million tonnes of <a href="shale%20oil">shale oil</a>.
